page.title: 16REDBOURN'S LAST 40 YEARS(2)
page.content: Also there were many celebrations in the village. The village now has over 5,500 people living in it.Housing estates have been built on the western side of the village and also just south of the Common.This is called the park.The {M1 Motorway}opened in 1958,the {Railway}closed in the{1960's}and the {By_pass}was finished in{November 1984. {Brook Bond Oxo}have a large factory in the village which employs over{300}people.Despite all these changes in some ways{Redbourn}has not changed.One of these ways is the friendliness of the people which I think will never ever change.
